publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2040 Michael Matheson: BAFTA Scotland Awards—That the Parliament expresses its disappointment that the BAFTA Scotland awards ceremony was not shown on either BBC or any of the commercial TV franchises serving Scotland; regards this as a lost opportunity to showcase the best of Scottish talent and promote the industry, and congratulates Paula Sage for her Best First Time Performance Award for "Afterlife", demonstrating the wide spectrum of talent within the Scottish film and television industries.

S2M-2040 Michael Matheson: BAFTA Scotland Awards—That the Parliament expresses its disappointment that the BAFTA Scotland awards ceremony was not shown on either BBC or any of the commercial TV franchises serving Scotland; regards this as a lost opportunity to showcase the best of Scottish talent and promote the industry, and congratulates Paula Sage for her Best First Time Performance Award for "Afterlife", demonstrating the wide spectrum of talent within the Scottish film and television industries.
S2M-2040 BAFTA Scotland Awards (lodged on 18 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2040 BAFTA Scotland Awards (lodged on 18 November 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2040 BAFTA Scotland Awards (lodged on 18 November 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-2040 BAFTA Scotland Awards (lodged on 18 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2040 BAFTA Scotland Awards (lodged on 18 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
